001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011/**
012 * A CommandGroup that runs a set of commands in parallel, ending only when a specific command (the
013 * "deadline") ends, interrupting all other commands that are still running at that point.
014 *
015 * <p>As a rule, CommandGroups require the union of the requirements of their component commands.
016 *
017 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
018 */
019public class ParallelDeadlineGroup extends CommandGroupBase {
020  // maps commands in this group to whether they are still running
021  private final Map<Command, Boolean> m_commands = new HashMap<>();
022  private boolean m_runWhenDisabled = true;
023  private boolean m_finished = true;
024  private Command m_deadline;
025
026  /**
027   * Creates a new ParallelDeadlineGroup. The given commands (including the deadline) will be
028   * executed simultaneously. The CommandGroup will finish when the deadline finishes, interrupting
029   * all other still-running commands. If the CommandGroup is interrupted, only the commands still
030   * running will be interrupted.
031   *
032   * @param deadline the command that determines when the group ends
033   * @param commands the commands to be executed
034   */
035  public ParallelDeadlineGroup(Command deadline, Command... commands) {
036    m_deadline = deadline;
037    addCommands(commands);
038    if (!m_commands.containsKey(deadline)) {
039      addCommands(deadline);
040    }
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Sets the deadline to the given command. The deadline is added to the group if it is not already
045   * contained.
046   *
047   * @param deadline the command that determines when the group ends
048   */
049  public void setDeadline(Command deadline) {
050    if (!m_commands.containsKey(deadline)) {
051      addCommands(deadline);
052    }
053    m_deadline = deadline;
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public final void addCommands(Command... commands) {
058    requireUngrouped(commands);
059
060    if (!m_finished) {
061      throw new IllegalStateException(
062          "Commands cannot be added to a CommandGroup while the group is running");
063    }
064
065    registerGroupedCommands(commands);
066
067    for (Command command : commands) {
068      if (!Collections.disjoint(command.getRequirements(), m_requirements)) {
069        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
070            "Multiple commands in a parallel group cannot" + "require the same subsystems");
071      }
072      m_commands.put(command, false);
073      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
074      m_runWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
075    }
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public final void initialize() {
080    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
081      commandRunning.getKey().initialize();
082      commandRunning.setValue(true);
083    }
084    m_finished = false;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public final void execute() {
089    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
090      if (!commandRunning.getValue()) {
091        continue;
092      }
093      commandRunning.getKey().execute();
094      if (commandRunning.getKey().isFinished()) {
095        commandRunning.getKey().end(false);
096        commandRunning.setValue(false);
097        if (commandRunning.getKey().equals(m_deadline)) {
098          m_finished = true;
099        }
100      }
101    }
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  public final void end(boolean interrupted) {
106    for (Map.Entry<Command, Boolean> commandRunning : m_commands.entrySet()) {
107      if (commandRunning.getValue()) {
108        commandRunning.getKey().end(true);
109      }
110    }
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  public final boolean isFinished() {
115    return m_finished;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
120    return m_runWhenDisabled;
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  public ParallelDeadlineGroup deadlineWith(Command... parallel) {
125    addCommands(parallel);
126    return this;
127  }
128}
